title: Narrative-Based Instructional Design Development for English Learner Education Standards

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of English learner education standards and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning for current practitioners in digitally supported environments, requiring a formative assessment-centered feedback structure

learning_goals: Compare differences between WIDA standards and state-developed standards to design context-appropriate standard implementation plans.
Analyze leadership logic in English learner education settings by writing a report using narrative research methods.
Develop standards-based assessment tools and conduct field application simulations through project-based learning (PBL).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
